actions.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution establishing the House of Representatives Page Board for supervision and education of pages.

summary.text: Establishes the House of Representatives Page Board to ensure that the page program is consistent with the functions of the House and the welfare of pages.

titles.title: A resolution establishing the House of Representatives Page Board for supervision and education of pages.
